title: "Console gaming is cheaper"
body:
"Ah boy, my console's harddrive, CPU, or anything for that matter seems to have died. Looks like I'll have to buy a new console entirely since I cannot replace the broken part..." 

"Looks like the next gen is here, time to buy a new console since devs won't be making games for my current one now..." 

Yeah....*cheaper*

JS, consoles aren't nearly as cheap as you people believe they are. Sony and Microsoft purposely limit what you can do with them hardware wise so you cannot upgrade it or repair it, because doing that means less money for them; the only real exception to this is Nintendo stuff since their stuff has a bunch of gimmicks like movement and touchscreen...

Stop the ignorance, join the PC ~~master race~~ side.
